column4: I few minutes ago I had a working ubuntu edgy, I could play games with 3d acceleration.. all was fine.. then a crash.. now I can't even run glxgears without X restarting
if you're lucky you've saved lots of the commands you used into .bash_history either as root or your user
also it could be related to not loading a module. loading a kernel module and having a kernel module load at boot are seperate operations
